parameters.question: What are touch gestures?
parameters.choice1: Gestures in which by swiping you access functions faster
parameters.choice2: Gestures in which by shaking you access functions faster
parameters.choice3: Gestures in which by typing you access functions slower
parameters.choice4: Gestures in which by moving you access functions slower
parameters.answer: Gestures in which by swiping you access functions faster
